title: Winter Pheasant Stew
ingredients: ['1 pheasant, legs and breasts removed', '400ml boiling water', '15 whole peppercorns', '1 large onion, sliced', '100g seasoned flour', 'olive oil', '300ml good red wine (Merlot)', '25g butter', '1 leek, sliced', '100g sliced mushrooms', '5 stalks of asparagus', '400g sugar snap peas', '200g new potatoes', '1 boquet garni (rosemary, sage, parsley, thyme)', '200g baby veg (carrots, sweetcorn)', 'good pinch of sea salt', 'good pinch freshly ground black pepper']
